00017 WhorlHistory::WhorlHistory(Whorl* _ptr_whorl)
00018 {
00019         // clean start
00020         ResetHistory();
00021         
00022         // store that protected data member!
00023         m_ptr_whorl = _ptr_whorl;
00024         
00025         // allocate space for the vector containers
00026         m_stateHistory.reserve(HISTORY_RESERVE_SIZE);
00027         m_controlHistory.reserve(HISTORY_RESERVE_SIZE);
00028         //m_measurementHistory.reserve(HISTORY_RESERVE_SIZE);
00029         m_parameterHistory.reserve(HISTORY_RESERVE_SIZE);
00030 };

00042 void WhorlHistory::AppendHistory(const double& _appendTime)
00043 {
00044     AppendHistory(ssfTime(_appendTime));
00045 }

00057 void WhorlHistory::AppendHistory(const ssfTime& _appendTime)
00058 {
00059         // time stuff
00060         History::AppendHistory(_appendTime);
00061         
00062         // the four vectors
00063         m_stateHistory.push_back( m_ptr_whorl->GetState() );
00064         m_controlHistory.push_back( m_ptr_whorl->GetControl() );
00065         //m_measurementHistory.push_back( m_ptr_whorl->GetMeasurementAndTime() );
00066         m_parameterHistory.push_back( m_ptr_whorl->GetParameter() );
00067         
00068         return;
00069 }
